title: Forget Bad and Bougie, Stay Fine and Frugal
itunes:title: Forget Bad and Bougie, Stay Fine and Frugal
description:
Tuesday 1/31 - Today on the show The Breakfast Club was not in there home city New York instead they were in LA but that did not stop them from broadcasting live and having listeners call up about their opinion on Tony Rock's comments on Steve Harvey not being a good fit for being the voice of relationships as well as callers speaking on first date deal breakers. Also, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to gospel singer Tina Campbell after making comments supporting Donald Trump.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 1/31 - Today on the show The Breakfast Club was not in there home city New York instead they were in LA but that did not stop them from broadcasting live and having listeners call up about their opinion on Tony Rock's comments on Steve Harvey not being a good fit for being the voice of relationships as well as callers speaking on first date deal breakers. Also, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to gospel singer Tina Campbell after making comments supporting Donald Trump.
